alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 22 at 2:05PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR EASTERN LEAKE...SOUTHERN WINSTON AND NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 205 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Zama to 6 miles southwest of Madden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Stallo around 220 PM CDT. Dixon around 225 PM CDT. Neshoba around 235 PM CDT. Bethsaida around 245 PM CDT. House around 250 PM CDT. Herbert Springs around 255 PM CDT. Forestdale around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Noxapater, Tucker and Walnut Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
